biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler2

Class LessCompilerOptionsBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler2.LessCompilerOptionsBuilder

  • public class LessCompilerOptionsBuilder
extends Object
    Responsible for creating new instances of the LessCompilerOptions which control the LessCompiler compilation process.
    Since:
    2.0.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LessCompilerOptionsBuilder()
      Constructs a new instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LessCompilerOptions build()
      Builds a new instance of the LessCompilerOptions and resets this builder state.
      LessCompilerOptionsBuilder compress(boolean compress)
      Sets whether a CSS code should be compressed.
      LessCompilerOptionsBuilder compressOff()
      Disables a CSS code compression.
      LessCompilerOptionsBuilder compressOn()
      Enables a CSS code compression.
      protected LessCompilerOptions getOptions()
      Returns an instance of the LessCompilerOptions and sets it in this builder.
      LessCompilerOptionsBuilder ieCompatability(boolean ieCompatibility)
      Sets whether a CSS code should be compatible with IE browser.
      LessCompilerOptionsBuilder ieCompatabilityOff()
      Sets that a CSS code does not have to be compatible with IE browser.
      LessCompilerOptionsBuilder ieCompatabilityOn()
      Sets that a CSS code should be compatible with IE browser.
      LessCompilerOptionsBuilder includePaths(List<String> includePaths)
      Sets available include paths.
      LessCompilerOptionsBuilder includePaths(String[] includePaths)
      Sets available include paths.
      LessCompilerOptionsBuilder includePathsNull()
      Clears available include paths.
      LessCompilerOptionsBuilder javaScript(boolean javaScript)
      Sets whether a compiler should allow usage of JavaScript language.
      LessCompilerOptionsBuilder javaScriptOff()
      Disallows usage of JavaScript language.
      LessCompilerOptionsBuilder javaScriptOn()
      Allows usage of JavaScript language.
      LessCompilerOptionsBuilder lineNumbers(LessCompilerOptions.LineNumbersValue lineNumbers)
      Sets whether a compiler should generate inline source-mapping.
      LessCompilerOptionsBuilder lineNumbersAll()
      Enables generating inline source-mapping in comments blocks and @media queries.
      LessCompilerOptionsBuilder lineNumbersComments()
      Enables generating inline source-mapping in comments blocks.
      LessCompilerOptionsBuilder lineNumbersMediaQuery()
      Enables generating inline source-mapping in @media queries.
      LessCompilerOptionsBuilder lineNumbersOff()
      Disables generating inline source-mapping.
      LessCompilerOptionsBuilder relativeUrls(boolean relativeUrls)
      Sets whether a compiler should rewrite relative URLs.
      LessCompilerOptionsBuilder relativeUrlsOff()
      Disables rewriting relative URLs.
      LessCompilerOptionsBuilder relativeUrlsOn()
      Enables rewriting relative URLs.
      LessCompilerOptionsBuilder rootPath(String rootPath)
      Sets a path which will be added to every generated import and URL in CSS code.
      LessCompilerOptionsBuilder rootPathNull()
      Clears a value of the root path option.
      LessCompilerOptionsBuilder silent(boolean silent)
      Sets whether a compiler shouldn't log compilation warnings.
      LessCompilerOptionsBuilder silentOff()
      Enables logging compilation warnings.
      LessCompilerOptionsBuilder silentOn()
      Disables logging compilation warnings.
      LessCompilerOptionsBuilder strictImports(boolean strictImports)
      Sets whether a compiler should disallow an @import operation inside of either @media blocks or other selector blocks.
      LessCompilerOptionsBuilder strictImportsOff()
      Allows usage of an @import operation inside of either @media blocks or other selector blocks.
      LessCompilerOptionsBuilder strictImportsOn()
      Disallows usage of an @import operation inside of either @media blocks or other selector blocks.
      LessCompilerOptionsBuilder strictMath(boolean strictMath)
      Sets whether a compiler should try and process all maths in Less code.
      LessCompilerOptionsBuilder strictMathOff()
      Sets that a compiler shouldn't try and process all maths in Less code.
      LessCompilerOptionsBuilder strictMathOn()
      Sets that a compiler should try and process all maths in Less code.
      LessCompilerOptionsBuilder strictUnits(boolean strictUnits)
      Sets whether a compiler should guess units in Less code when it does maths.
      LessCompilerOptionsBuilder strictUnitsOff()
      Sets that a compiler shouldn't guess units in Less code when it does maths.
      LessCompilerOptionsBuilder strictUnitsOn()
      Sets that a compiler should guess units in Less code when it does maths.
